description: This file defines the registration page component for the frontend of a food delivery application. It includes a React component that manages user registration form state, handles form submission, interacts with API hooks, and manages navigation and UI feedback.

methods.name: RegisterContent
methods.description: Main React component for rendering the user registration form, handling user input, submission, and navigation.

methods.name: RegisterPage
methods.description: Wrapper component that renders RegisterContent within Suspense for loading fallback.
